code_samples.title: Code samples
code_samples.description: Some use cases of typical GroupDocs.Conversion for Java operations

sample_1.title: Convert PDF to image
sample_1.content_1: A commonly encountered scenario involves converting an entire PDF document or specific pages into a collection of images. GroupDocs.Conversion for Java offers the capability to convert PDFs into various image formats, such as TIFF, JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP, and more.
sample_1.content_2: Unlike other conversions, this process requires the declaration of a SavePageStream delegate, which specifies the naming format for the saved images. You can select your preferred image format using the ImageFileType class.
sample_1.code_title: Converting PDF to PNG in Java
sample_1.comment_2: Set the convert options for PNG format

sample_2.title: Convert a segment of a large document
sample_2.content_1: With GroupDocs.Conversion for Java, you can effortlessly convert specific pages from a lengthy document.
sample_2.content_2: You have two methods to accomplish this, depending on your requirements. You can either convert a range of pages or convert specific pages.
sample_2.code_title_1: Convert DOCX (pages 2-4) to PDF in Java
